hr.caellian.flow.network

Interface NetworkComponent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FluxContainer<B>, FluxEmitter<B>, FluxReceiver<B>, StructureComponent, StructureCore, StructureDelegate

    public interface NetworkComponent
    Network component is any object which can be a part of a Network.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Creates a default Network for this component.

      Called when component network isn't found.

    • Method Detail

      • getNetwork

        Network getNetwork()
        Returns:
        Network owning this network component.

      • isCompatibleWithNetwork

        boolean isCompatibleWithNetwork(Network networkClass)
        Parameters:
        networkClass - network to check for compatibility with this component.
        Returns:
        true if this network component is compatible with argument network.

      • setNetwork

        Network setNetwork(Network network)
        Parameters:
        network - Network to give ownership over this component to.
        Returns:
        previous owner Network.

      • createDefaultNetwork

        Network createDefaultNetwork()
        Creates a default Network for this component.
        Returns:

      • networkNotFound

        void networkNotFound()
        Called when component network isn't found.

      • getPosition

        java.lang.Object getPosition()
        Returns:
        Object representing position of this network component.

      • getNeighbours

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,NetworkComponent> getNeighbours()
        Returns:
        Map containing neighbour Network Component positions and their respective objects.
